content: > this pattern is available for ** free on > my blog here 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed > for sale contains full pattern > including important notes stitch > guide written instructions chart and > complete photo-tutorial in one > printable file without advertisements sea square was designed especially for granny square day 2019 and chunky monkey yarn by scheepjes it uses a combination of linen stitch and brioche crochet with lots of texture light weight and nice drape it can be turned into a pillow cover or used as an afghan block **pattern notes** sea square is worked in rounds with alternating right and wrong sides the rounds are joined in the corners only one color is used per round and yarn is not cut at the end of every round unless otherwise stated in the pattern **what you ll need ** yarn in three colors * chunky monkey by scheepjes* aran 100g/116m/127yds **yarn a ** 1218 x 1 ball 60g **yarn b ** 2005 x 1 ball 25g **yarn c ** 1302 x 1 ball 55g crochet hook 5mm or size needed to get an acceptable gauge gauge after 7 rounds square measures 10cm/4 across *alternative yarn scheepjes softfun* **yarn a ** 2466 x 1 ball 20g **yarn b ** 2510 x 1 ball 10g **yarn c ** 2519 x 1 ball 15g crochet hook 3 5mm gauge for softfun after 10 rounds square measures 10cm/4 across *alternative yarn stone washed * sport 78% cotton x 22% acrylic 50g/130m/142yrds **yarn a ** 813 x 1 ball 25g **yarn b ** 804 x 1 ball 10g **yarn c ** 830 x 1 ball 17g crochet hook 4mm gauge for stone washed after 10 rounds square measures 10cm/4 across *alternative yarn scheepjes organicon * fingering 100% cotton organic soft 50g/170m/186yrds **yarn a ** 216 x 1 ball 13g **yarn b ** 200 x 1 ball 6g **yarn c ** 201 x 1 ball 11g crochet hook 3mm gauge for organicon after 13 rounds square measures 10cm/4 across **finished size** the size of the finished square depends on the yarn and hook you use mine are approx 35cm/13 5 for chunky monkey 25cm/10 for softfun and stone washed 18cm/7 for organicon ***************************************************************************** **an original lillabjörncrochet design copyright 2014-2019 all rights reserved ** this pattern is for personal use only it cannot be sold redistributed republished online and offline translated without permission and edited as part or in whole you can sell your finished products but you cannot use my pictures to promote them always credit me as a designer 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/11/sea-square html
